# Cambrian Tools ðŸ”§

## Installation
To install the package run the following script:
```bash
pip install cambriantools
```

## How to use
To execute [master_run.sh](master_run.sh) just run the following command in the terminal:
```bash
bash master_run.sh
```

## Data
